SEARCH
Module sc2002.scmb.grp1.hms
Package controller

Class MedicalRecordController

java.lang.Object
controller.MedicalRecordController
public class MedicalRecordController extends Object
The MedicalRecordController class provides methods for managing medical records. It allows viewing, creating, and updating medical records, and checking the existence of patients and records. It serves both patient and doctor views.
